ygData.subject: Few things things
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) I have been meaning to ask this for a while: what scenario numbers are claimed again?  I m asking so I can reserve my scenario numbers for the gladiator

Subject: Few things things

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

1) I have been meaning to ask this for a while: what scenario numbers 
are claimed again?  I'm asking so I can reserve my scenario numbers 
for the gladiator tournament.  I have reserved all the numbers from 
where the Tyrx left off to #200 for myself.

2)I would like to see us try to start the '50 project'.  In case 
anyone has forgotten, it was to be a team effort at creating 50 
brand-new scenarios for the game.  The scenarios were to be where you 
could start from scratch and work your way through them.  If we can 
get 5 volunteers to start it, I will spearhead working on it.

3)just out of curiosity, johnny, you aren't trying to create a team to 
rival my own would-be gods, right?
